Experiment_description: Experiments conducted involved processing symbol sequences into graph representations using two-layer GCNs. The models were evaluated using metrics like Structural-Diversity-Weighted Accuracy (SDWA) and Color-Weighted Accuracy (CWA), with a focus on establishing baseline performances.
Significance: These experiments are crucial as they establish baseline models for graph-based sequence processing, identifying key challenges such as overfitting and class imbalance. The insights gained pave the way for future improvements in model architecture and data handling to enhance generalization performance.
Description: The experiments involved converting symbol sequences into graph structures, using GCNs to process these graphs, and evaluating models with various accuracy metrics. The models were trained over multiple epochs, with careful tracking of training and validation losses. Some nodes addressed data handling bugs, while others focused on foundational model setups.

List_of_included_plots.description: The plot shows the training and validation cross-entropy loss over five epochs.
List_of_included_plots.analysis: Demonstrates model learning from training data but suggests potential overfitting due to the validation loss behavior.

List_of_included_plots.description: This plot shows the training and validation loss over epochs.
List_of_included_plots.analysis: Shows effective training with alignment in loss curves, indicating limited overfitting.

List_of_included_plots.description: This plot depicts the trends of three metrics (SDWA, CWA, SWA) over epochs.
List_of_included_plots.analysis: Metrics peak early and decline, suggesting overfitting and the need for regularization.

List_of_included_plots.description: This plot illustrates the SDWA (Shape-Weighted Accuracy) curves for training and validation sets.
List_of_included_plots.analysis: Indicates stagnation in shape-based learning, suggesting model limitations.

Key_numerical_results.analysis: Highlights the limited generalization capability of the model.

Key_numerical_results.description: Final validation SDWA for SPR_BENCH in Node 038fb84b3881458ba8d60cc66de5fa01.
Key_numerical_results.analysis: Represents a higher generalization performance compared to other nodes.
